troubleshooting.title: Text Rendering Issues on Mac OS X

keywords.indexterm: Text flows out of code blocks

condition.title: Problem
condition.p: On Mac OS X, I sometimes encounter issues there text is not rendered properly. For example, when tags are displayed in Author mode, sometimes the tag icon is rendered over the top of text (hiding the text) and sometimes text flows outside of code blocks.

cause.title: Cause
cause.p: This is an uncommon error that cannot be fixed in current versions.

steps-informal.p: , go to Editor Edit modes Author , and deselect the Fast text layout option.
